text.0: Fake Facebook pages of reputable news and media organisations are being used to deliberately spread misinformation. Here's a list of such pages and some tips on how to avoid following them: https://t.co/aPzM7bSN60 #DubawaChecks
text.1: Nnamdi Kanu claimed Nigeria is ranked the number one country according to the population of people killed because they are Christians. However, there is no evidence to backup his claim. Read the fact-check here: https://t.co/ZDhSC2kiBe #DubawaChecks
text.2: The claim that a British study shows that passing gas helps one live longer and inhaling gas may prevent dementia is misleading and false. Read the fact-check here: https://t.co/YGLPXPk56X #DubawaChecks
